ControlMetrics.description: The ControlMetrics action provides the ability to reset the metric collection for a particular metric or metrics.
ControlMetrics.longDescription: The ControlMetrics action provides the ability to reset the metric collection for a particular metric or metrics.

MetricCollectionEnabled.description: The MetricCollectionEnabled parameter indicates the desired operation to perform on the metrics. The parameter value is 4 (Reset).
MetricCollectionEnabled.longDescription: The MetricCollectionEnabled parameter indicates the desired operation to perform on the metrics. The parameter value is 4 (Reset).

TargetResource.description: Reference to the DellBaseMetricDefinition or DellAggregationMetricDefinition for which collection is to be enabled or disabled.
TargetResource.longDescription: Reference to the DellBaseMetricDefinition or DellAggregationMetricDefinition for which collection is to be enabled or disabled.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellMetricService.description: Provides the ability to manage metrics.
DellMetricService.longDescription: Provides the ability to manage metrics.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ExportThermalHistory.description: The ExportThermalHistory() method is used to exports the thermal history of the system from Lifecycle Controller to a remote share, in xml or csv format.
ExportThermalHistory.longDescription: The ExportThermalHistory() method is used to exports the thermal history of the system from Lifecycle Controller to a remote share, in xml or csv format.

IPAddress.description: IP address of the network share.
IPAddress.longDescription: IP address of the network share.

Password.description: Password of the account to access the share.
Password.longDescription: Password of the account to access the share.

ShareName.description: Name of the CIFS share or full path of the NFS share.
ShareName.longDescription: Name of the CIFS share or full path of the NFS share.

Username.description: User name for the network share authentication.
Username.longDescription: User name for the network share authentication.

Workgroup.description: Workgroup for the CIFS share - optional.
Workgroup.longDescription: Workgroup for the CIFS share - optional.
